description: Planet Eaters is an addictive new application! Travel through space as a Planet Eater who is hungry and needs to eat. Eat lots of planets to beat each level, but watch out for the black holes! Keep playing to unlock multiple galaxies and harder levels! When you finish a level, you can automatically submit your scores to an online scoreboard. You can view online scores and sort them by week, day, all time, or just your scores! With an unlimited number of levels, Planet Eaters is sure to get you addicted! The accelerometer-based game-play lets you move your Planet Eater with just the movement of your hands, and take your casual gaming to a whole new level! ** Update includes fixed online scores, shield upgrade, more storyboard, increased performance, and bug fixes. **
